member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSourceInsertedEventHandler.Invoke(System.Object,DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSourceInsertedEventArgs)

summary.para: Represents a method that will handle the event.

member.param: An object that contains event data.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSourceInsertedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Object)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the XpoDataSourceInsertedEventArgs class with a persistent object that has been inserted in the via a bound data-aware control.

member.param: An descendant representing the inserted persistent object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSourceInsertedEventArgs.Value

summary.para: Provides access to the persistent object that has been inserted in the via a bound data-aware control.

member.value: An descendant representing the persistent object that has been inserted.

summary.para: A collection of persistent objects for ASP.NET controls.
Initializes a new instance of the XpoDataSource class with default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSource.Criteria

summary.para: Gets or sets the string representation of criteria used to filter persistent objects to be retrieved by the data source control.

member.value: A value that represents the filter criteria.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSource.CriteriaParameters

summary.para: Provides access to the collection of parameter values that are used to build the data source control's filter criteria.

member.value: A object that stores the filter criteria's parameter values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSource.DefaultSorting

summary.para: Specifies how data source contents are sorted by default, when sort order is not specified by the bound control.

member.value: A String object which contains the names of the columns against which data source contents are sorted.

summary.para: Enables you to respond to inserting a persistent object via a bound data-aware control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSource.ServerMode

summary.para: Gets or sets whether server mode is enabled for the data-aware control bound to the current data source control.

member.value: true to enable server mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSource.Session

summary.para: Gets or sets the used by the current data source control to load and save persistent objects.

member.value: A object connected to a data store.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpo.XpoDataSource.TypeName

summary.para: Gets or sets the type name of persistent objects to be retrieved by the data source control.

member.value: A value that specifies the type name.
